title: amysteryremains
author: amysteryremains
content: Hey everyone,I've been thinking about real world asset tokenization lately and I'm curious why it hasn't gained as much interest as one might expect. Is it because there's a lack of trusted platforms for trading these assets, or are there other reasons?Let's discuss the potential barriers that might be hindering the widespread adoption of real world asset tokenization. What are your thoughts on this? Do you think creating a reliable trading platform could be a game-changer? Or are there other factors we should consider?Looking forward to hearing your opinions!
